name: zombie variant
description:
This is a first person shooting game，Players are surrounded by zombies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can avoid zombie attacks or kill zombies, and live as long as possible.
Control keys:
Right-click targeting
WASD movement
The left Shift running
Left mouse button attack
Space leaping
The left Ctrl squats
Mouse control direction
R Loaded Weapons
Middle mouse button switch weapons
